data.name: The World is Binary: Why Love is the Answer
data.detailed_description:
The World is Binary, a 3D visual novel, takes you on a journey of good and evil, science and religion, and questions what is true or false. The experience explores the ideas of love and fear, and offers practical steps on how you can improve your life and change the world.

Essentially a multimedia book, the experience lasts about 30 minutes and explores many serious and deep issues, such as the ideological differences between people of faith and the scientific community, the people's freedom and the government's order, and explores how the emotions of love and fear hold a deeper meaning in life.

There are no choices or branching. It is, in essence, a book. However there are real time 3D graphics running in the background, and relaxing music to listen to as you read. The graphics are configurable for both high-end and low-end machines, and you can hide the text and just watch the experience as a looping benchmark.

Press Alt + Enter for Full Screen mode.
Press Space to Toggle Text.
Press Escape to Access Options.

data.short_description: The World is Binary, a 3D visual novel, takes you on a journey of good and evil, science and religion, and questions what is true or false. The experience explores the ideas of love and fear, and offers practical steps on how you can improve your life and change the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 4-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 6-core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Super / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 21.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 21.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 4-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 21.10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 6-core processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 Super / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
